column4: I want to spend no more than say $1,800 total (US) and am looking for a laptop that will run Ubuntu on it... that has 1680 x 1050 res or so...
yes, with dapper everything works on mine including the sd card reader
i've got the wsxga+ model, works out of the box at 1680 x 1050
I really like my 15" HP dv4150us
which just isn't enough real estate
thinking about giving this one to the wife...
I've already got a 1.6Ghz M centrino chip though.... I'd want to get something faster than this ;)
the top version is 1900 something resolution but seems a bit high for general use, i strain on this one sometimes
